question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. man in grey suit
B. man in striped shirt
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The man in the striped shirt is visibly behind the man in the grey suit and further into the background, making his 3D location clearly farther from the camera.
